text: Virajini Lalithya de Silva, also known as Nirosha Virajini (Sinhala: නිරෝෂා විරාජිනී) (born 13 January 1973) is a Sri Lankan award-winning singer, musician and music director with a career spanning over 23 years. She has sung songs in Sinhalese, Tamil, English, Hindi, Malayalam and Japanese. In 2000, 2002 and 2016 she was awarded as Best Female Vocalist at President's Award and Sarasaviya Awards for her contribution as a playback singer of the films "Rajya Sevaya Pinisai" and "Kinihiriya Mal" respectively. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Sri Lankan female singers Category:Sinhalese singers Category:Living people Category:21st-century women singers
title: Nirosha Virajini
